TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It's really difficult to fly and requires pinpoint precision.

I wish to make a KSP photoshop forum game.

Granted. Everyone photoshops Jeb and Val on a date in a rocket.

I wish for wisheS

Granted. You can only wish for something that includes the words "fiery death."

I wish Kerbin reentry was a little nicer...

granted, instead of heating, krakens corrupt the game

i wish you could surface sample bop kraken

Granted. It corrupts the install folder.

I wish I had more money for a new computer.

Granted, but the computer is Deep Thought and only ever spits out 42.

I wish time would stop exactly when I told it to.

Granted, but i'll increase ur reaction time. You will now react far too late for anything. Also when u stop time you won't be able to restore it, as you will stop as well. :->

I wish for a stinky pile of poo.

You get a clean pile of poo.

I want Sharknado and Mega Shark vs Mecha Shark to not give anyone ocular traumatization or brain traumatization.

granted, it makes people suicide instead

i wish russia did a new MI

Granted. It crashed.

I wish for a cheap lawyer.

Granted. He does a bad job and you are convicted of pirating content.

I wish to do my homework.

Granted. Done doesn't mean passed.

I wish we all had brain implants inside of us set to emit a high frequency burst of energy and sound whenever our mailboxes are full.

Done. Your head's just 'sploded

i just want to be paid to stay home and play with my synthesizers.

Edited September 24, 2015 by Clear Air Turbulence

Granted. You're paid with garbage.

I wish to outsmart the whole forum community.

Granted. You are banned

- - - Updated - - -

I wish I had a pet Kerbal

Granted. He blows up your house.

I wish for a good, cheap lawyer.

Granted, it loses every case 'cause it's so cheap.

I wish for wishing for wishes.

granted, all of them kill you

i wish i had a Tunguska

Your wish is granted,

we are all now fleas

I wish for a B-17 Flying Fortress

Granted. It crashes.

I wish for Ã¢Ë†â€ V.

Granted. you get five triangles.

I wish for I wish for a good, cheap lawyer who can win cases.

Granted. You wish for a good lawyer, but not all wishes come true.

I wish my axe was sharper.

Granted, but your deodorant cuts off your arms.

I wish for a good, cheap lawyer who can win cases.

Granted you spend the rest of your money getting into trouble

I wish for a F-15 (side note this plane is undefeated)

Granted. It hits anti-aircraft fire.

I wish for a good, cheap lawyer who can win cases and get me money back.
